presets.name: Easy
presets.description: The generated settings will be of lesser difficulty. Requirements for B. Locker, Troff n' Scoff, fairies, etc. will often be lower than their defaults. Many of the more difficult settings will never be set.

presets.name: Standard
presets.description: The generated settings will be of average difficulty. Requirements for B. Locker, Troff n' Scoff, fairies, etc. will be roughly around their defaults. Some of the most difficult settings will never be set.

presets.name: Difficult
presets.description: The generated settings will be of greater difficulty. Requirements for B. Locker, Troff n' Scoff, fairies, etc. will often be higher than their defaults. All settings have a chance to be set.

presets.name: Difficult with QoL Shuffle
presets.description: The generated settings will be of greater difficulty. Requirements for B. Locker, Troff n' Scoff, fairies, etc. will often be higher than their defaults. Quality of life options may be disabled. All settings have a chance to be set.
